description: Officer Ned is looking into several complaints about a creepy janitor at the junior college. Bursting into Brenn's basement living quarters, He catches the janitor Brenn Wyson with all of his kinky paraphernalia. Ned calls in for backup but radio signals can not travel in the bowels of this basement. Brenn shouts out several smart remarks and Ned takes the law into his own hands. Ned uses Brenn's electricity toys on him and watches Brenn screams in agony. It's not over. Brenn breaks free and puts officer Ned to bed. He turns Ned's ass into hamburger with the flogger and fucks the daylight out him afterward.
title: The policeman fucks with our creepy janitor.
